title: Stress & Anxiety Relief with TCM
excerpt: Discover how acupuncture, herbs, and lifestyle strategies can calm the nervous system.
author: Dr. Huang
contentMarkdown:
Chronic stress affects sleep, digestion, and mood. TCM addresses stress by calming the mind and restoring balance.

## Common Signs of Stress Imbalance

- Racing thoughts
- Poor sleep
- Tension headaches
- Digestive discomfort

## TCM Strategies

- Acupuncture to regulate the nervous system
- Herbal formulas to nourish Heart and Liver balance
- Breathing and daily routine adjustments

Consistency matters. Many patients feel improvement within a few sessions.
